nodes.text: Narmonday was an Outer Rim planet long forgotten by most of the galaxy. The planet was inhabited mostly by bounty hunters, it being a very dry desert-like planet having almost no life. The only natural inhabits were small deer like creature three to four inches tall nicknamed by clones as "srisits".

It was used for an army base by the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. The planet was abandoned by the Republic after a few short months because of lack of food. The planet was eventually also abandoned by bounty hunters because no clients wished to come to the deserted planet.
